results.title: I am not alone
results.brief_description: In this original and stylish animation, a young man involved in a freak accident is catapaulted to the underworld where he is confronted with the prospect of his eternal existance after death.

results.title: Stan
results.brief_description: This 3D computer animated tragedy tells the story in verse of a mad scientist who creates a human boy. A rework of the classic Frankenstein story, this black fairytale adds a new element to the tale.

results.title: Style 'n progress
results.brief_description:
Animated monster taggers from outer space invade the streets of Kuala Lumpur to brilliantly colour our environment.
Original music by D’Navigator, edited and arranged by Markus Kellow.

results.title: Unwind the urban
results.brief_description:
Set to traditional Japanese music, this black and white computer animation depicts a natural world of beauty and tradition.
Music by Tadano Noriko - “Apple for one’s eye”

results.title: The Orb

Music by Markus Kellow.
